name: CKBull
description: CKBull is a mobile wallet application developed by Peersyst Technology for the Nervos Network (CKB), launched in July 2022. Designed as a non-custodial wallet, it provides a user-friendly interface to manage CKB tokens, bridged tokens via ForceBridge, NFTs, and Nervos DAO deposits. Built on CKB’s secure Layer 1 and UTXO-based Cell model, CKBull enables users to create multiple wallets, stake CKB in the Nervos DAO for rewards, and track assets seamlessly. Available on Android and iOS, it supports customization (e.g., name, colors, currency) and integrates with Nervos ecosystem features, though some users have reported issues with withdrawals. CKBull aims to simplify access to the Nervos blockchain for both new and experienced users.

highlights.title: Non-Custodial Multi-Wallet Support
highlights.description: Allows users to generate and manage multiple non-custodial wallets for CKB, tokens, and NFTs, ensuring full control over assets

highlights.title: Nervos DAO Integration
highlights.description: Simplifies staking CKB in the Nervos DAO, enabling users to earn rewards and track deposits with ease

highlights.title: ForceBridge Compatibility
highlights.description: Supports tokens and assets bridged via ForceBridge, enhancing interoperability within the Nervos ecosystem

faq.q: How can I add USDC|eth, BNB|bsc, ETH|eth, USDC|bsc and BTC|bsc tokens in CKBull Wallet?
faq.a: https://forcebridge.com/ and the send tokens back to CKBull. Soon with our signer app you will be able to connect CKBull to forcebridge so you can sign from CKBull using mobile device.

faq.q: Why can’t I withdraw my CKB? Oh oh! Something went wrong.
faq.a: To withdraw from the app you have to at least leave 61 $CKB for the cell allowing you to receive to that same address once again. We don’t support yet two input cells vs 1 output.

faq.q: Can I buy $CKB from CKBull Wallet?
faq.a: Not, yet. We are working on it. On/Off-Ramp with transak.com soon!
